Named Entity Recognition for Text Analysis

Sep 6, 2015 â€¢ Luuk Derksen

Tweet

Comparison of different Named Entity Recognition (NER) tools and APIs.

  • NLTK (Python)
  • Stanford NER (Java)
  • Alchemy by IBM (API)
  • Indico.io (API)
  • Intellexer (API)

Three pieces of text:

"Israeli PM condemns video of Jewish extremists celebrating toddler's death" "Duchy Originals forced to buy back shares from Prince Charles's charitable foundation" "Russia's airstrikes on Syria appear futile with little progress on ground"
